## 1. read in the data
```{r}
data <- read_csv("C:\\Users\\User\\Documents\\Semester4\\Psychology Lab\\XPLabFinal\\data\\03 paper\\raw\\S4b.csv")
```

## 2 correct header
```{r}
names(data) <- paste(names(data), data[1, ], sep = "_")
data <- data[-1,]
```


```{r}
glimpse(data)
```
## split into upright and inverted and 
```{r}
upright <- select(data, ResponseID_ResponseID ,ends_with("_upright"))
```
